version_description: You asked, we made it. We’ve introduced a dedicated currency converter to the app, so now you can calculate exchange rates directly from your dashboard

Welcome to Revolut 6.9 – Trading is now available for Premium and Standard users. You can buy and sell fractional shares in over 450 U.S. companies. Capital at risk.

This feature is not available in Singapore.

This feature is not available in Singapore.
Welcome to Revolut 6.10. This edition is packed with improvements under the hood, all designed to make your Revolut experience even more buttery smooth.
We've made it even easier to reset your contactless limits. When you're close, you'll see a banner in the app. Simply tap on it to reset.

You can also now view and reset your Revolut card contactless limit directly from the Card screen
